sources.title: Murder in Space (1985)
sources.description: Set in the "not-so-distant future", the crew of an international space station are set to return triumphantly to Earth, until someone starts killing the other crew members. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/murder-in-space-1985/

metadata.Plot: 3 aliens get a bit of their 'friend', Bernard, hacked off. Bernard keeps making the prat of himself play space ball. It's while he is playing space ball that the 2 others start playing around with the ship's controls. They accidentally disconnect his part of the ship, leaving him stranded whilst they crash into a large blue planet close by...
metadata.Actors: Mel Smith, Griff Rhys Jones, Joanne Pearce
